dependent-rows.delete-dependent-rows: There are two options. You can delete the record and all links to it, or you can redirect all linked records to a new target. This record will be deleted permanently.
dependent-rows.delete-no-dependent-rows: The record will be deleted permanently.
dependent-rows.dependent-rows-header: There are links to this record in another table
dependent-rows.dependent-rows-header_plural: There are links to this record in {{count}} other tables
dependent-rows.confirm-delete-body: On confirmation, the record will be permanently deleted and all links to it will be unlinked. This can not be undone.
dependent-rows.confirm-delete-header: Really delete the record and all links?
dependent-rows.confirm-merge-body: On confirmation, the record will be permanenly deleted. All links to it will be relinked to the new target. The deletion can not be undone.
dependent-rows.no-dependent-rows-header: There are no links to this record
dependent-rows.merge-rows-success-header: The record {{oldRowTitle}} was permanently deleted. Links targeting it were changed to target {{linkTargetTitle}} instead.

select-link-target.title: Link records targeting {{linkTitle}} to
select-link-target.nothing-selected: No record selected as new target

error_saving_cell: The cell could not be saved. Refresh your browser now?
show_dependency_text: This data record is linked in one table.
show_dependency_text_plural: This data record is linked in {{count}} tables.

final.unlock_toast: 2x left click or enter key to unlock

translations.dialog_question:
You modified content which had already been translated. Would you like to inform other languages' translators?
Choose "no" if you just fixed a mistake.

jump.no_such_row: No row with ID {{row}} in this table
jump.no_such_column: No column with ID {{col}} in this table

editor.sanity_info: Please make sure the title describes the purpose properly

jumpspinner.title: Hold on, we bring you there!
jumpspinner.subtitle: Waiting for more data.

copy_links_error: Can't paste, the entry in the clipboard links to table {{table}}.
copy_kind_error: Can not paste the copied value here.

confirm_copy.header: Proceed pasting multi language cell contents?
confirm_copy.info: You copied a multi language cell. By pasting you will overwrite all existing values in the respective languages like this:

empty.text: No text has been entered yet
empty.number: No number has been entered yet
empty.links: No data has been linked yet
empty.attachments: No files have been linked yet
empty.date: No date has been chosen yet

link-overlay-empty: Nothing linked yet. You can choose data from the following list.
link-overlay-add-new-row: Create a new entry in table {{tableName}}
entity-view-search-placeholder: Search for column title or content
cardinality-reached: An item  may not have no more than {{maxLink}} link to that table.
check-column: Could not copy all entries. Please double-check the data set.

reset-table-view.title: Reset table view?
reset-table-view.message: Are you sure you want to reset the table settings? You can also adjust your individual settings accordingly in the user profile in the global settings.

clear-cell.title: Clear cell
clear-cell.confirmation: Do you also want to clear the cell value for all other languages?
clear-cell.description: This will clear the following values:
